tool_description: This endpoint transcode && compress audio files like WAV, MP3 to AAC format (which is best compression quality for mobile).  And directly upload / send to your Amazon AWS S3 Bucket without any other call. It is super easy. It can compress 100 times original files and 3-5 times compressed files This endpoint is referenced as "C3" in our postman collection. We provide very detailed documentation there. Please check our postman documentation for full info.
name: C3- Transcode/Optimize Audio & Upload Your AWS S3 Bucket
title: C3- Transcode/Optimize Audio & Upload Your AWS S3 Bucket
tool_name: C3- Transcode/Optimize Audio & Upload Your AWS S3 Bucket

api_list.name: C3- Transcode/Optimize Audio & Upload Your AWS S3 Bucket
api_list.description:
you must have AWS IAM user credentials with "putObject"
if you don't have, then check our A3 api, it returns temporary download link.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://c3-transcode-optimize-audio-upload-your-aws-s3-bucket.p.rapidapi.com/apifsp/transcoder/upload-to-aws-s3/audio"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "c3-transcode-optimize-audio-upload-your-aws-s3-bucket.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
